short_summary: Accommodation service for the Department of National Defence (DND) in Lincoln, UK.
description: This contract is for accommodation services that include, but are not limited to:  22- Aug to 01 Oct (Period of Accommodation)
full_summary:
### UK Accommodation in Lincoln for Department of National Defence

#### Tender Details

| Tender | Title | Reference Number | Amendment Number | Solicitation Number |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| W0138-23CW01 | UK Accommodation in Lincoln | WS4041004724-Doc4121953214 | 0 | WS4041004724 |

#### Tender Information

*   Date Published: 31st July 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: 7th August 2023 at 14:00 (EDT)
*   Validity Period: This tender supersedes all previous tender notices.

#### Description
We are seeking offers from contractors to provide accommodation services to the Department of National Defence (DND) in Lincoln, UK. The accommodation must be located within a 6-mile drive of Royal Air Force Station Waddington, Lincoln LN5 9NB, UK.

The required services will be in place from 23rd August to 1st October 2023. Bid submissions must include all supporting documentation.

The contractor should note that a debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request for suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.

#### Award Criteria

*   Lowest Price

#### Requirements Documentation
Refer to [Link to Discovery Ariba](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17015502?extsite=MTcwMTU1MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for full tender details.

#### Contact Information
For tender queries, contact Martine Hunter at:
Email: <martine.hunter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
Note: Martine Hunter's contact details are subject to change. Please verify before communicating.

#### Amendment
This tender supersedes and cancels previous tender number W0138-23CW01 dated 20th June 2023 with a closing date of 6th July 2023 at 2PM (EST). Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys poster closing time.

Amendments and updates will be posted on this website. All changes will be communicated through regular email notifications.

The expected date of issue of this Notice to Procurement is 31st July 2023.
